initial_question.title: is possible to remove system tray?
initial_question.body:
I want to remove the system tray from the polybar, to display only the bar itself.

Is that possible?

If yes, how to make.

satisfaction_conditions: System tray is no longer visible in the polybar display
Configuration change is persistent across polybar restarts

initial_question.title: polybar order
initial_question.body:
is there a way to control polybar order? lets say i have two polybar's on top, how would i control which would be top and which bottom?

at the moment its randomly loading their position and i have to reload launch.sh and hope it gets to the right position.

satisfaction_conditions: Multiple polybars display in a consistent, predictable order
Order remains stable across multiple launches/reloads
